description: Slow braised celery takes on lots of flavour when cooked in white wine and chicken stock, perfect to serve with roast chicken.
name: Braised Celery Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.8 cup chicken stock, hot, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 160Â°C. Cut the tough, brown base of each celery heart, keeping all stalks attached. Cut each heart into quarters. Place in an ovenproof dish.
Pour over the stock, wine and vinegar, scatter the peppercorns and bay leaves and dot with butter. Cover with foil and bake for 1.5 hours, until tender.
